cast.overview: When elderly pensioner Umberto Domenico Ferrari returns to his boarding house from a protest calling for a hike in old-age pensions, his landlady demands her 15,000-lire rent by the end of the month or he and his small dog will be turned out onto the street. Unable to get the money in time, Umberto fakes illness to get sent to a hospital, giving his beloved dog to the landlady's pregnant and abandoned maid for temporary safekeeping.
cast.title: Umberto D.

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Carlo Battisti (10 October 1882 - 6 March 1977) was an Italian linguist and actor, famed for his starring role in Vittorio de Sica's Umberto D.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Carlo Battisti, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Carlo Battisti
details.place_of_birth: Trento, Austria-Hungary (now Trento, Trentino-Alto Adige, Italy)
